alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 01 at 11:04AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Areas of fog, some briefly dense, through early this afternoon... As winds turn west and off the lake late this morning, areas of fog are pushing onshore along the I-90 corridor from east of Cleveland up through northwestern Pennsylvania. This fog will persist through the early afternoon. Visibilities below 1 mile can be expected at times in areas of fog, with brief visibilities as low as one quarter of a mile possible. Fog will be most widespread near the I-90 corridor east of Cleveland in extreme northeast Ohio and northwestern Pennsylvania, with the hills south of I-90 into northern Geauga County and southern Erie County also being prone to seeing briefly dense fog. Motorists should be prepared for changeable and briefly low visibility. Slow down, allow extra following distance, and turn on your headlights in fog.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake
